title.rendered: RHINO BAR SUIT MITSUBISHI MQ TRITON

content.rendered:
THE MITSUBISHI MQ TRITON 3D EVOLUTION FRONT BAR IS NOW AVAILABLE

The new and exciting Evolution front replacement winch bar is available for order now. These new bars give your vehicle an aggressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, 2 snatch rated recovery points, great angle of approach, and a heavy duty bash plate.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Powder coat and available standard a slightly textured flat black. It is a 3mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard the colour of the bar and can be optioned as stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights which are an option on many other brands.

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated LED Foglights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight bar

Spotlights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT MITSUBISHI MQ TRITON

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
